title: Protest for Gas in Dehiwala
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A protest demanding cooking gas took place on Friday (20) by blocking the Dehiwala – Maharagama main road at the Nedimala junction.
News 1st Correspondent said that due to this protest heavy traffic congestion was reported.
